original_body_lines: Hey, do you know that lemon juice has many benefits for our hair as well? Okay, read on…
Take 02 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice and mix it with a tablespoon of fresh aloe vera gel. Apply this mixture on the scalp and wash your hair with a mild shampoo after about 30 minutes..

Take 04 tablespoons of henna powder, an egg, the juice of a lemon, and a cup of warm water. Make a thick paste with these ingredients. Apply this mix to your scalp and hair and wait for a couple of hours. Shampoo off.

Take the juice of a lemon, 01 tablespoon of olive oil and 01 tablespoon of castor oil. Mix them in a bowl and heat the mixture a bit. Massage this mixture on your scalp for a few minutes. After an hour or so, wash off. Use this blend twice a week for the best results.
Mix the juice of a lemon with an equal quantity of white vinegar. Massage your scalp with it for some minutes. Thenwait for about 15 minutes and rinse off with a mild shampoo.
Mix 03 tablespoons of lemon juice with 02 tablespoons of honey. Apply the mixture to the scalp. Leave it on your scalp for 30 minutes and then wash it off with a mild shampoo.

Combine half a cup of apple cider vinegar with the juice of a lemon. Apply on your scalp and leave it on for 20 minutes. This will help the mix absorb excess oil from your scalp. Rinse off with water.
(As a mask and mixed with other ingredients, you can apply lemon juice every 03-04 days. However, you shouldn’t apply only lemon juice frequently)
